CustomField.description: Used for Grant Approval Cases and entered upon creation; is a user lookup that tracks which Mission Finance user is responsible for managing the grant that's being requested. Gets passed to the equivalent field on Opp when the case is Closed - Resolved, and should be in sync with the same field in NetSuite. should eventually get moved to Case Teams
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Member of Mission Finance team. Please verify prior to submitting grant approval.
CustomField.label: Grant Manager
